thread.title: Wheels Up preferred private aviation partner of Greenbrier Resort
thread.title_full: Wheels Up preferred private aviation partner of Greenbrier Resort

author: Gulli Arnason
title: Wheels Up preferred private aviation partner of Greenbrier Resort
text:
Air and Travel · 
Kenny   is now the preferred private aviation partner of The Greenbrier.Under this partnership, select Greenbrier guests and all Greenbrier Sporting Club members will have the unique opportunity to book flights at member rates one-time as a way of getting from their home origin to The Greenbrier aboard the Wheels Up private fleet of King Air350i and Cessna Citation Excel/XLS aircraft. There are additional special benefits if a Greenbrier guest or Sporting Club member purchases a Wheels Up membership.In addition, current Wheels Up members will receive VIP benefits at the iconic Greenbrier resort including complimentary room nights, preferred tee-times on the award-winning Old White TPC championship golf course and The Snead, The Sporting Club´s private, member-only course, as well as access to some of their most coveted roster of events including The Greenbrier Classic, a PGA TOUR, FedExCup Event.Wheels Up is a membership-based private aviation company that significantly reduces the upfront cost to fly privately, while providing unparalleled flexibility, service and safety.Nestled in White Sulphur Springs in the Allegheny Mountains of West Virginia, The Greenbrier has been welcoming guests since 1778. It encompasses more than 10,000 acres of undulating landscape that includes: five golf courses; a championship indoor and outdoor tennis facility, along with an exciting new 2,500 seat tennis stadium named Center Court at Creekside; The Greenbrier Clinic (specializing in executive health); a 40,000-square-foot spa; a mÃ©lange of sporting activities; shops; luxury real estate at The Greenbrier Sporting Club; guests-only casino; and, at its heart, a vast and imposing grand hotel.   
  July 17, 2015 · No comments
